addonManifest.name: Azure Storage
addonManifest.description: Azure provides scalable, durable cloud storage, backup, and recovery solutions for any data, big and small. It works with the infrastructure you already have to cost-effectively enhance your business continuity strategy as well as provide storage required by your cloud applications including unstructured text or binary data such as video, audio and images.
addonManifest.deploymentNotes: Configured to work on .NET 4.5 runtime, and Apprenda 5.0.x
addonManifest.author: Chris Dutra

property.description: If set to true, each developer will need to provide their own Amazon credentials, otherwise the default creds will be used to provision RDS instances.
Set to false if you do not want your storage replicated globally. Default is true.
